name: apple_watch
logic_chain: electric = false → operate = false; broken = true → wear = false
emergency: Device without power cannot operate; broken watch cannot be worn

name: monitor
logic_chain: electric = false → operate = false; broken = true → watch = false
emergency: No power monitor cannot display; broken monitor unusable

name: power_socket
logic_chain: broken = true → supply power = false
emergency: Damaged socket cannot supply power

name: straw
logic_chain: broken = true → drink = false; bent = true → insert = difficult
emergency: Broken or bent straw unusable

name: apple
logic_chain: rotten = true → eat = false; whole = false → eat = false
emergency: Rotten or damaged apple cannot be eaten

name: sentence
logic_chain: missing words → read = incomplete
emergency: Incomplete sentence causes misunderstanding

name: glasses
logic_chain: broken = true → wear = false; messy = true → see = impaired
emergency: Broken glasses unusable; dirty glasses impair vision

name: data_cable
logic_chain: broken = true → install = false; unplugged = true → operate = false
emergency: Broken or unplugged cable cannot transfer data

name: mug
logic_chain: open = false → fill = false; hot = true → hold = risky
emergency: Closed mug cannot be filled; hot mug may cause burns

name: coffee_cup_and_coaster
logic_chain: broken = true → hold = false; missing coaster → table may be damaged
emergency: Broken cup unusable; no coaster may cause surface damage

name: stirring_spoon
logic_chain: broken = true → stir = false
emergency: Broken spoon cannot be used for stirring

name: tissue_box
logic_chain: empty = true → take out = false
emergency: Empty tissue box cannot provide tissues

name: wet_wipes
logic_chain: dry = true → wipe = false
emergency: Dry wipes lose cleaning ability

name: small_pot
logic_chain: broken = true → cook = false; hot = true → hold = risky
emergency: Broken pot unusable; hot pot unsafe to hold

name: broccoli
logic_chain: rotten = true → eat = false
emergency: Rotten broccoli cannot be eaten

name: mosquito_repellent_liquid
logic_chain: empty = true → use = false
emergency: Empty repellent ineffective

name: chair
logic_chain: broken = true → sit down = false; wet = true → sit down = false
emergency: Broken or wet chair unsafe to sit

name: umbrella
logic_chain: broken = true → open = false; open = false → protect = false
emergency: Broken umbrella cannot open; closed umbrella cannot protect

name: laptop
logic_chain: electric = false → operate = false; broken = true → operate = false
emergency: No power or broken laptop cannot operate

name: blocks
logic_chain: broken = true → stack = false
emergency: Broken blocks cannot be stacked

name: book
logic_chain: torn = true → read = difficult
emergency: Torn book reduces readability

name: power_strip
logic_chain: broken = true → supply power = false
emergency: Damaged power strip cannot supply power

name: clothes
logic_chain: messy = true → wear = false
emergency: Dirty clothes cannot be worn

name: sofa
logic_chain: broken = true → sit down = false; wet = true → sit down = false
emergency: Broken or wet sofa unsafe to use

name: broom
logic_chain: wet = true → sweep = false; broken = true → sweep = false
emergency: Wet or broken broom cannot sweep

name: cabinet
logic_chain: broken = true → open = false; open = false → store = false
emergency: Broken cabinet cannot open or store items

name: drawer
logic_chain: broken = true → open = false; open = false → store = false
emergency: Broken drawer cannot open or store items

name: box
logic_chain: open = true → put = true; open = false → put = false; empty = true → put = true; full = true → put = false; broken = true → close = false
emergency: Box closed or full, unable to put new items; broken box cannot be closed

name: basket
logic_chain: open = true → put = true; empty = true → put = true; full = true → put = false
emergency: Basket full cannot put new items

name: plastic_water_bottle
logic_chain: closed = false → fill = true; empty = false → drink = false; broken = true → hold = false
emergency: Broken or open bottle may leak; empty bottle cannot be drunk from

name: test_tube
logic_chain: broken = true → hold = false; messy = true → fresh = false
emergency: Broken test tube unusable; messy test tube affects experiment

name: test_tube_rack
logic_chain: broken = true → hold = false; unstable = true → support = false
emergency: Broken or unstable rack cannot hold test tubes securely

name: backpack
logic_chain: open = true → put = true; closed = false → put = false; broken = true → carry = false
emergency: Broken backpack cannot carry or store items securely

name: canvas_bag
logic_chain: broken = true → carry = false; full = true → put = false
emergency: Broken or full bag cannot carry more items

name: plastic_bag
logic_chain: broken = true → carry = false; full = true → put = false
emergency: Torn or full plastic bag cannot carry items

name: computer_stand
logic_chain: broken = true → hold = false; unstable = true → support = false
emergency: Broken or unstable stand may cause computer to fall
